most_active_tickets.title: Raycast Extension Incompatible with Current Version of Raycast

common_issues.title: Pieces integrations failing due to version incompatibility
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with Pieces integrations (Raycast extension, core dependencies) due to version incompatibility.  The Raycast extension is not compatible with recent Raycast versions (e.g., 1.100.3), and core dependencies are failing to initialize on Linux (Pieces OS 4.3.1). Users are advised to check for updates for both Pieces and the related integrations (Raycast).

related_issues.title: Raycast Extension Incompatible with Current Version of Raycast
related_issues.text:
Raycast Extension Incompatible with Current Version of Raycast


### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Raycast Extension

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

As mentioned on Discord, it appears that the Raycast needs to be updated to be compatible with (at least) the current version of Raycast 1.100.3. Trying to use any of the extension's functions triggers an error saying:

> Your Pieces Raycast Extension needs to be updated,...

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/506778e6-5b13-4811-a21c-82c42384cb41)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Ensure core dependencies; Retry Step
related_issues.text:
Ensure core dependencies; Retry Step
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

### Pieces OS, Desktop Application

* Operating System / Platform: Linux

* Pieces OS Version 4.3.1





After installation, the “Initialize Desktop App” step has run successfully. The “Ensure core dependencies” step displays the message “Retry Step”.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving the version incompatibility issue affecting the Raycast extension and core dependencies on Linux. This appears to be the most frequent problem reported by users.
Investigate the root cause of the "Ensure core dependencies; Retry Step" error on Linux and provide a fix or workaround. Ticket #809 has high activity and indicates a persistent issue.
Update the Raycast extension to be compatible with the latest Raycast versions (e.g., 1.100.3) to address the reported errors.
Improve communication with users regarding known issues and workarounds. Consider updating the documentation or providing in-app notifications about compatibility issues.
Monitor the incoming support tickets for any emerging trends or new issues related to specific operating systems or application versions.
